products.name: Star Cool Shield
products.description: Star Cool Shield, a groundbreaking solution that combines the excellence of cool roof coating and paint technology. This innovative product stands out as an energy-saving coating, providing superior heat reflective and insulation properties, making it the go-to choice for those seeking high albedo paint with the highest Solar Reflectance Index (SRI) - 130 .

products.name: Star Cool Shield +
products.description:
Star Cool Shield +, the groundbreaking 2-in-1 solution that transforms your space into a cooler and waterproof haven.
This cutting-edge cool roof coating, fortified with complete waterproofing capabilities, is crafted to deliver exceptional thermal insulation, heat reflection, and water protection.
It stands as the ultimate choice for elevating the longevity and comfort of your surfaces, featuring cool roof coating, high albedo paint, heat reflective properties, thermal insulation paint, solar reflective technology, sun control, and heat-resistant attributes.

products.name: Star Cool Shield Walls
products.description:
Star Cool Shield - Walls, an innovative heat-reflective paint that keeps surfaces up to 5 degrees Celsius cooler, courtesy of its high Solar Reflective Index (SRI).
Offering complete protection against sun, dust, and wind, this extraordinary product delivers unmatched benefits.

products.name: Star Cool Shield Industrial
products.description: Star Cool shield industrial High Heat Protective, Heat Proof, High Albedo, Highest SRI, Sun Controlling Solar Reflective Paint is manufactured considering the tough demands of the industry

products.name: Star Heat Shield
products.description:
Star Heat Shield, your go-to solution for advanced Nano-coating on glass, offering anti-heat, sun control, and heat blocking benefits.
Reduce temperatures by up to 31? with this cost-effective, DIY solution, blocking IR and UV rays without compromising visibility

products.name: Star Heat Shield Industrial
products.description:
Star Heat Shield Industrial is a high-performance, heat-resistant coating that protects industrial equipment and surfaces from extreme temperatures, thermal stress, and corrosion.
Its specialized formulation provides superior insulation, reflecting radiant heat and minimizing heat transfer, thereby ensuring the safety and longevity of industrial assets.

products.name: Star Thermal Shield Solvent
products.description:
Star Thermal Shield - a polysiloxane-based, high-heat-resistant coating.
Ideal for chimneys, machinery, and surfaces emitting heat and smoke.

products.name: Star Insulation Shield Industrial
products.description:
Star Insulation Shield Industrial Is An Advanced, Acrylic-Based, Nano-Technology-Enhanced Elastomeric Coating Formulated To Provide Exceptional Thermal Insulation For Industrial Surfaces.
Its Reflective And Insulative Properties Ensure Significant Energy Savings, Enhanced Operational Efficiency, And Increased Equipment Lifespan By Minimizing Thermal Stresses

products.name: Star Fire Shield Retardant
products.description:
Star Fire Shield Retardant Water based paint that resists fire and provide extra safety for steel, timber, and plaster from burning and destruction?
# Inflammable and non-combustible # Reduces the expansion of fire # Instant action to avoid entrance in substrate # No or very less smoke generation # Non-toxic and low VOC # Time period of 30- 120 minutes

products.name: Star Fire Shield Intumescent
products.description:
Star Fire Shield Intumescent Water based paint that resists fire and provide extra safety for steel, timber, and plaster from burning and destruction?
# Inflammable and non-combustible # Reduces the expansion of fire # Instant action to avoid entrance in substrate # No or very less smoke generation # Non-toxic and low VOC # Time period of 30- 120 minutes

products.name: Star Water Shield solvent
products.description:
Star Water Shield is a high-performance solvent-based ultra hydrophobic coating from StarShield.
It forms a long-lasting hydrophobic layer on surfaces to protect them from water, moisture, and dampness.
This solvent-based ultrahydrophobic coating is designed to repel water and provide long-lasting durability, making it the go-to choice for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike.

products.name: Star Water Shield water based
products.description:
Star Water Shield- water based, a cutting-edge water-based coating that offers unparalleled long-term protection against water and moisture damage.
This advanced eco-friendly solution is formulated with renewable plant extracts, ensuring a non-toxic and sustainable choice for your waterproofing needs.
With its ultra-hydrophobic properties and water contact angle of over 130°, Star Water Shield creates a transparent and crystal-clear finish that preserves the original esthetics of your surfaces.
Not only is Star Water Shield environmentally friendly, but it also provides exceptional performance.
Its 100% water-based, zero VOC, and solvent-free formulation make it safe for both indoor and outdoor use, even on delicate surfaces.
This innovative coating offers up to 5 years of reliable protection with just a single application, making it a cost-effective solution that saves on maintenance expenses.

products.name: Star Water Shield concentrate
products.description:
Star Water Shield Concentrate Superhydrophobic transparent penetrating waterproofing compound is the innovative waterproofing protection for various surfaces against damage due to water.
This high-performance product is designed for long-lasting protection by forming a true barrier against moisture, hence suitable for residential and commercial applications.

products.name: Star Aqua Shield Walls
products.description:
Star Aqua Shield - walls is an elastomeric waterproofing coating for roofs that offers superior protection against water damage.
It is a high-quality product manufactured by Star Shield Paints, a renowned company in the industry.

products.name: Star Aqua Seal 2K
products.description:
A Food-Grade, Epoxy-Based Waterproofing And Repairing Coating Designed For Areas Requiring Strict Hygiene Standards And Safe Contact With Potable Water.
It Forms A Seamless, Impermeable Barrier With Superior Adhesion And Chemical Resistance.

products.name: Star Damp Primer water based
products.description:
Star Damp Primer Water-Based is an advanced wall primer designed to combat dampness and ensure a smooth, long-lasting paint finish.
Its water-based formulation makes it eco-friendly and easy to apply, offering superior adhesion and moisture resistance.

products.name: Star Leak Proof PU
products.description:
Star Leak Proof Pu-Based Is A Single-Component, Elastic, Moisture-Curing Polyurethane-Based Waterproofing Sealant.
It Is Designed For High Durability, Exceptional Adhesion, And Excellent Weather Resistance, Making It Ideal For Diverse Waterproofing And Sealing Tasks Both Internally And Externally.
It Offers Strong Performance Even Under Varying Weather Conditions, From Intense Heat To Heavy Rainfall

products.name: Star Leak Proof Epoxy
products.description:
Star Leak Proof Epoxy Injection Is A High-Performance, Solvent-Free, Two-Component Epoxy Resin Specifically Designed For Sealing And Structurally Reinforcing Cracks And Cavities In Concrete, Brick, And Natural Stone Substrates.
With Its Exceptional Low Viscosity And Deep Penetration Capability, It Effectively Fills Cracks As Narrow As 0.2 Mm, Restoring Structural Integrity And Preventing Further Deterioration.

products.name: Star Aqua Seal Colour
products.description:
Star Aqua Seal Colour is a high-performance waterproofing coating.
Provides superior moisture protection and prevents water seepage.
Ideal for both residential and commercial applications.
Available in a range of vibrant, aesthetic colors.
Suitable for protecting roofs, walls, terraces, water tanks, and more.

products.name: Star Water Seal 2k
products.description:
Star Water Seal 2K, the game-changing nano-modified cementitious waterproofing compound that will revolutionize the way you protect your buildings from water damage.
With its advanced technology, Star Water Seal 2K creates a powerful barrier that repels water molecules like nothing else.
Say goodbye to leaks, seepage, and water damage that can wreak havoc on your construction projects.
This versatile product is suitable for both indoor and outdoor applications, making it perfect for a wide range of construction projects.
Whether it's a residential building, commercial complex, or industrial facility, Star Water Seal 2K has got you covered.

products.name: Star Water Seal 2k +
products.description:
Seal and Protect with Star Water Seal 2K+
Safeguard your surfaces from water damage and extend their lifespan with Star Water Seal 2K+, an advanced solution designed for superior waterproofing and protection.
This cutting-edge product excels in sealing surfaces effectively, making it an ideal choice for a variety of residential and commercial applications.

products.name: Star Water Seal Industrial
products.description:
Star Water Seal - Industrial a Complete Waterproof Coating is a single component, polymer-modified, cement-based, fast setting, flexible waterproofing and crack-bridging membrane for concrete surfaces.
It is a polymer-modified cementitious coating that can be applied to concrete surfaces to provide a waterproof barrier, as well as repair and fill small cracks.
It is suitable for both internal and external surfaces, and can be used on a variety of substrates including concrete, brick, and mortar.

products.name: Star Cement Cure
products.description:
Star Cement Cure enhances and protects your cement surface with our cement cure
Waterproofing paint.
This advanced formula combines superior curing and
waterproofing properties to ensure your structure remains strong, resilient and
visually appealing.
It is UV resistant, highly durable, strengthens the
concrete, permeable, resistant to corrosion.
Choose Our innovative solution for
long-lasting protection and durability in all your construction projects.

products.name: Star Cement Cure Blocks
products.description:
Star Cement Cure - Blocks, the ultimate integral waterproofing compound for concrete and mortar.
If you're involved in the construction industry or planning any construction projects, you need to know about this incredible product.
Star Cement Cure - Blocks is a revolutionary solution designed to provide superior protection against water damage for your constructions.
It acts as a powerful water-repellent barrier, effectively preventing dampness, efflorescence, and other water-related issues that can weaken and damage your structures.
With Star Cement Cure - Blocks, you can ensure the longevity and durability of your constructions.
By creating a moisture-free environment, it safeguards your projects from the harmful effects of water, ensuring they remain strong and intact for years to come

products.name: Star Aqua Shield transparent
products.description:
Star Aqua Shield - Transparent is a high-quality waterproofing coating designed for roofs, tiles, and industrial sheds.
It offers excellent transparency while providing effective protection against water damage.

products.name: Star Water Proof Exterior
products.description:
STAR WATER PROOF - EXTERIOR Universal repairing UV Resistant, Waterproof compound for Interior and Exterior surfaces.
Acrylic based compound makes the product flexible to use not only for internal but also for external application and makes the waterproofed surface UV resistant too.
This formulation also accounts for bonding new and old concrete mortar.

products.name: Star Water Proof interior
products.description:
Star Water Proof Interior is a modified styrene butadiene latex that is intended to be used in cementitious systems as a measuring liquid, bonding agent, and waterproofing agent.
Because of its excellent hydrolysis resistance, it is said to be a universal waterproofing compound.

products.name: Star Curing Shield Water Curing Agent
Star Cement Shield Hydro
products.description:
STAR CEMENT SHIELD - HYDRO is a nano-based liquid waterproofing admixture added to concrete or mortar during mixing to enhance water resistance and prevent water penetration of the plastered / screed surface.
It offers protection against water seepage and staining on walls and surfaces for several years, preserving the pristine condition of the surfaces.
Star Cement Shield - Hydro is a hydro/aqua version of
the popular Star Water Shield, but with a silicon-based added twist, hence
making it more powerful in repelling water and keeping your plastered surfaces looking great.
Star Cement Shield – Hydro can be used in a variety of applications, including
below-grade structures, swimming pools, and water tanks.
Unlike external
membranes, this admixture cannot be torn or damaged during backfill operations.

products.name: Star Smart Paint White Exterior
products.description: Star Smart Paint Exterior is an anti-fading, UV resistant, Exterior Paint with self-cleanable feature Can be applied even on wet walls No Primer needed UV Resistant, Dust Repellent, and hydrophobic to prevent dampness and leakage# Elastomeric so help in crack bridging Quick drying reduces the work pause Strong adhesion for life 10 years

products.name: Star Smart Paint White Base Interior
products.description:
Star Smart Paint Interior is an innovative, high-quality interior paint designed to provide a beautiful, durable finish while offering advanced features like easy application and enhanced performance.
This smart paint is formulated to offer excellent coverage, quick drying times, and a variety of modern finishes that cater to the needs of both residential and commercial interiors.
It is perfect for creating aesthetically pleasing and functional spaces with minimal effort.

products.name: Star Premium Emulsion White Base Interior
products.description:
Star Premium Emulsion Interior is a high-quality paint designed to give your walls a flawless finish that will last for years to come.
This premium paint is specially formulated to provide excellent coverage and durability, making it the perfect choice for homeowners who want their walls to look their best.One of the key features of Star Premium Emulsion interior is its smooth and even application.
This paint goes on easily and dries quickly, leaving behind a beautiful, seamless finish that will make any room look like it was professionally painted.
Whether you are painting a small bathroom or a large living room, this paint will make the job easy and leave you with stunning results.

products.name: Star Premium Emulsion White Base Exterior
Star Elegant  Shield White Base Interior
Star Elegant  Shield White Base Exterior
Star Oxy Shield
products.description:
Star Oxy Shield Is A Revolutionary Water-Based Emulsion Paint Specifically Designed For Interior Walls, Offering Not Just Aesthetic Brilliance But Also Actively Contributing To Healthier Indoor Environments.
Formulated With Advanced Nano Technology, Star Oxy Shield Neutralizes Harmful Indoor Pollutants Such As Formaldehyde, Ammonia, Cigarette Smoke, And Other Vocs, Significantly Improving Indoor Air Quality.
It Also Provides A Soothing, Long-Lasting Fragrance And Ensures Clean And Fresh Indoor Air For Healthier Living Spaces

products.name: Star Enamel Shield
products.description:
Star Enamel Shield is a top-rated enamel formulated to provide advanced protection and a hard, glossy finish to a variety of surfaces.
The enamel slight chip resistance, resistance to fading, and wear work well on both interior and exterior surfaces.
It provides excellent adhesion, good coverage, and long-lasting color retention.

products.name: Star Mosquito Shield Aurelia
products.description:
Star Mosquito Shield Aurelia is a revolutionary product based on nanocapsules as an active ingredient that combines the benefits of insect repellent with the practicality of paint.
This unique solution is perfect for owners looking to protect themselves from pesky insects while adding an odorless fresh coat of paint to their living/commercial spaces.
This acrylic paint is specially formulated with natural mosquito-repellent ingredients that help keep these annoying insects at bay.
In addition to its insect-repelling properties, Star Mosquito Shield Aurelia offers all the benefits of traditional acrylic paint.
It is quick-drying, easy to apply, and suits any aesthetic preference.

products.name: Star Virus Shield Paint
products.description:
Star Virus Shield Paint is a specialized paint coating designed to provide protection against viruses and bacteria.
It is formulated with antimicrobial properties that can inhibit the growth and spread of harmful microorganisms on various surfaces

products.name: Star Gloss Shield Water Based Enamel
products.description:
Star Gloss Shield is an advanced water-based enamel designed to provide a glossy, durable finish to various surfaces.
It combines aesthetic appeal with robust protection, making it ideal for both interior and exterior applications.

products.name: Star Damp  Shield WaterBase
products.description:
Star Damp Shield - Water Based ,  is an advanced solution designed to provide superior waterproofing and durability.
This innovative product combines the benefits of high albedo coating, thermal insulation, and waterproofing, making it the ideal choice for various residential and commercial applications.

products.name: Star Lamination Shield
products.description:
Star Lamination Shield  is a Nano Modified Scratch & Scrub Resistant.
Dust & Water Repellent anti graffiti top coat A Nano based polymerised advanced protective coating from Rain, Dust, Pollution with no maintenance ,Advance benefits, more protection and longer durability ,Anti-graffiti property in Oleophobic nature , Transparent lamination with anti-scrub and anti-scratch form , Resistant to dust, chemicals, water, acids, alkali, etc.  Self-cleaning method with relief from repainting for several years ,Excellent stain prevention

products.name: Star Metal Shield Aurelia
products.description:
Star Metal Shield Aurelia
Nano technology-based Superior Protective and anti-corrosive coating for metal

products.name: Star Metal Shield Water Based
products.description:
Star Metal Shield Waterbased Is An Advanced, Eco-Friendly Protective Coating Designed Specifically For Metal Surfaces, Providing Superior Resistance Against Corrosion, Rust, And Environmental Damage.
Utilizing Innovative Water-Based Technology, It Combines Robust Adhesion Properties, Excellent Durability, And Uv Stability, Ensuring Lasting Protection Without Harmful Emissions Or Solvents.
Ideal For Industrial Equipment, Structural Steel, Marine Applications, And Automotive Components, Star Metal Shield Water Based Is Easy To Apply, Dries Quickly, And Delivers Long-Lasting Performance, Significantly Extending The Lifespan And Maintaining The Aesthetics Of Metal Surfaces

products.name: Star Solar shield
products.description:
Nano-Based Ultra Hydrophobic Coating
The Star Solar Shield represents a new frontier in surface protection against heat and UV radiation.
Constructed to cope with the worst extremes, it provides a robust barrier that reflects solar radiation and reduces heat absorption.
With regard to residential and commercial applications, the advanced coating ensures that each surface retains its integrity above and below in a manner that effects durability and efficiency for longer.
By preventing overheating and thus lowering cooling costs, Star Solar Shield will retain the aesthetic of the surface by making this investment key in the lengthening of surface life.

products.name: Star Glass Shield Transparent
products.description:
STAR GLASS SHIELD- Ultra hydrophobic anti stain coating for Glass .
An innovative certified problem solver Nano coating for glass and ceramics to make them water and dust repellent.
Protective, ultra-hydrophobic layer of polyurethane ,Non-sticky, self-cleanable membrane , Reduction in dust and water stains help in increasing visibility  ,  Resistant to acids, chemicals, scratches, oils, etc.  Reflects 97% of UV and IR rays to reduce degradation and temperature  Long lasting protection

products.name: Star Graffitti Shield Solventbase
products.description:
Anti-Graffiti hydrophobic coating

Star Graffiti Shield solvent-based is a super hydrophobic modified nanotechnology-based Anti-Graffiti and Anti-Poster permanent coating to protect your walls.
It creates a tough, non-porous barrier that prevents graffiti from adhering to the surface.
It is often used on high-traffic areas or surfaces that are difficult to access for regular maintenance.
In addition to protecting against graffiti vandalism, anti-graffiti coatings can also offer other benefits, such as UV protection, weather resistance, and easy cleaning.
These coatings can help extend the life of surfaces, reduce maintenance costs, and maintain the aesthetic appeal of buildings and public spaces.

products.name: Star Graffitti Shield Solventbase
products.description:
Anti-Graffiti hydrophobic coating

Star Graffiti Shield solvent-based is a super hydrophobic modified nanotechnology-based Anti-Graffiti and Anti-Poster permanent coating to protect your walls.
It creates a tough, non-porous barrier that prevents graffiti from adhering to the surface.
It is often used on high-traffic areas or surfaces that are difficult to access for regular maintenance.
In addition to protecting against graffiti vandalism, anti-graffiti coatings can also offer other benefits, such as UV protection, weather resistance, and easy cleaning.
These coatings can help extend the life of surfaces, reduce maintenance costs, and maintain the aesthetic appeal of buildings and public spaces.

products.name: Star Fabric Shield
products.description:
Star Fabric Shield Is A Silicone-Based Water-Repellent Coating Specifically Designed For Textile Applications.
It Deeply Impregnates Fibers At A Molecular Level, Forming An Invisible, Breathable Barrier That Effectively Repels Water And Prevents Staining.
Ideal For Clothing, Outdoor Gear, Upholstery, And Industrial Fabrics, Star Fabric Shield Ensures Textiles Remain Dry And Comfortable Without Compromising Their Natural Softness Or Appearance.

products.name: Star Wood Shield-2k 2k PU- Aurelia
products.description:
Star Wood Shield 2k PU Aurelia - UV Resistant Ultra-hydrophobic Tough Lamination ?
A nano technology water repellent ultra-hydrophobic wood coating protection from termites and fungus # Transparent lamination on wooden surface to make it stain-proof # Self cleanable inhibits bacterial growth # Prevents invading termites, beetles, mold, etc. # Flexible for contraction and expansion of wood due to weather change # Oleophobic nature makes it highly durable # Available in natural and glossy finish

products.name: Star Wood Shield melamine- Aurelia
products.description:
Star Wood Shield Melamine Aurelia is a premium wood finish designed to offer outstanding protection and an elegant sheen to wooden surfaces.
This high-performance product is ideal for use on both interior and exterior wood surfaces, delivering long-lasting durability and superior aesthetics.
It combines the benefits of a melamine-based finish with the strength and durability of polyurethane, making it the perfect solution for wooden furniture, doors, windows, and other wood surfaces exposed to wear and tear.

products.name: Star Wood Shield Waterbase
products.description:
Star Wood Shield Waterbase is a specialized wood coating that gives a superior protective covering and enhances the durability and aesthetic appeal of wooden surfaces.
The water-based formula is environmentally friendly and provides a smooth, long-lasting finish that preserves the natural texture of the wood.

products.name: Star Wood Shield Polyster- Aurelia
products.description:
Star Wood Shield Polyester Aurelia is a premium wood coating solution designed to protect, preserve, and enhance the beauty of wooden surfaces.
This advanced formula provides superior protection against wear, moisture, and environmental damage, ensuring long-lasting durability and an elegant finish.
It is perfect for use on both interior and exterior wooden surfaces, offering a sleek, glossy, and professional appearance that elevates any wooden structure.

products.name: Star  NC Sealer
products.description:
Star Nc Sealer Is A High-Quality Nitrocellulose Sanding Sealer Formulated For Furniture, Cabinetry, Musical Instruments, And Interior Wood Surfaces.
Featuring Quick-Drying Capabilities, Exceptional Sandability, And Excellent Holdout For Subsequent Coatings, This Sealer Provides A Smooth, Uniform Surface, Reducing The Number Of Required Finish Coats.
Its Pale, Clear Nature Preserves The Natural Wood Appearance, Providing Excellent Adhesion And Preparation For A Variety Of Topcoat Finishes.

products.name: Star Cool Shield Floor
products.description: Star Cool Shield Floor Is An Advanced Heat-Reflective Floor Coating Engineered With Nano-Modified Acrylic Elastomeric Technology, Specifically Formulated To Reduce Surface Temperature And Enhance Durability Of Flooring Exposed To Harsh Sunlight And Heavy Foot Traffic. Its Innovative Reflective Properties Significantly Minimize Heat Absorption, Providing Superior Thermal Comfort And Substantial Energy Savings. Ideal For Industrial, Commercial, And Residential Applications, Star Cool Shield Floor Ensures Lasting Protection With Its Abrasion-Resistant, Waterproof, Anti-Slip, And Uv-Resistant Characteristics. Environmentally Responsible, This Voc-Free Coating Aligns Seamlessly With Sustainability Goals, Supporting Green Building Standards And Certifications.

products.name: Star Floor Paint
products.description:
Star Floor Paint provides style combined with durability, thereby making your floors look astounding but adding an extra layer of protection to them. It's a very flexible paint, recommended for many surfaces, and it provides that glossy, vibrant finish that decorates and protects from wear and tear.

Be it a touch of class or some charming feel, Star Floor Paint is your way to go for great floors that will last long.

products.name: Star Floor Shine
products.description:
Star Floor Shine is a neutral cleaner designed for the maintenance of various types of flooring, including marble, granite, ceramic, and more. Its neutral pH formulation suits all washable surfaces, providing a safe and effective cleaning solution.

Star Floor Shine is particularly beneficial for increasing the resistance of floor treatments to pedestrian traffic, making it ideal for heavily trafficked areas such as shopping malls and hotels.?

Unlike cleaners based on hydrochloric acid, Star Floor Shine is much safer and less reactive, especially on sensitive surfaces like marble.

products.name: Star Floor Paint 2K
products.description: Star Floor Paint Is Formulated From Advanced Epoxy-Based Resins, Providing A Seamless, Protective, And Aesthetically Appealing Finish. Designed To Withstand Heavy Traffic, Chemical Spills, And Environmental Stress, It Significantly Extends Floor Life While Enhancing Safety And Hygiene

products.name: Star Epoxy Flooring Top Coat Kit
Star Epoxy Flooring Clear /3D Top Coat KIT
Star Epoxy Flooring Metalic Top Coat Kit
Star Epoxy Flooring Texture Top Coat Kit
Star PU Flooring
products.description:
Star Pu Flooring Is An Advanced Polyurethane-Based Flooring System Designed To Deliver Exceptional Flexibility, Abrasion Resistance, And Chemical Protection. Its Elastomeric Properties Enable Superior Performance On Substrates Prone To Movement Or Thermal Expansion, Ensuring Crack-Bridging Capabilities And Lasting Durability.

Ideal For Commercial Kitchens, Hospitals, Pharma, Industrial Units, Parking Areas, And Residential Spaces, Star Pu Flooring Offers An Aesthetically Pleasing Seamless Finish While Meeting Stringent Hygiene Standards.

products.name: Star Floor Shield Heavy Duty
products.description: Star Floor Shield Heavy Duty is an advanced floor coating solution engineered for high-performance durability, designed to withstand heavy traffic, extreme wear, and harsh environmental conditions. It offers unparalleled protection for industrial, commercial, and residential flooring while enhancing appearance and safety.

products.name: Star Skid Shield Parking
products.description:
Star Skid Shield parking is specifically designed with seamless, abrasion-resistant anti-slip coating for floors.

Star Skid Shield - Anti-skid floor coating is a specialized solution designed to enhance safety by reducing the risk of slips and falls. It’s typically made with aggregates like sand or quartz embedded within a durable resin base, providing a rough texture that increases traction. Ideal for high-traffic areas, industrial settings, or wet environments, this coating is both functional and aesthetically versatile, available in various colors and finishes. It’s easy to apply and maintain, making it a practical choice for ensuring safer walking surfaces.

products.name: Star Road Marking
products.description:
Star Road Marking Paint
Water Based High Performance Non-Fading Strong Adhesive Tough Coating For Road Signs & Signals . The essential purpose of road marking is to guide and control traffic on a highway. It supplements the function of traffic signs.
Road Paints are critical and crucial to the enhanced safety for both vehicle drivers and pedestrians.
Star Road Marking Paint has glass beads that become the reason for shine and glow.

products.name: Star Road Repair
products.description: Star Road Repair is a specialized product that's designed to provide strong and durable solutions for fixing and maintaining road surfaces. This advanced formula is engineered to deliver high performance when it comes to filling potholes, cracks, and other surface damages. It ensures long-lasting repairs and improves road safety. Star Road Repair enhances the strength and durability of asphalt and concrete surfaces, making it an essential tool for both small repairs and big road maintenance projects.

products.name: Star Heat Shield
products.description: Star Heat Shield Is An Advanced, Nano-Modified Transparent Protective Coating Engineered Specifically For Glass Surfaces In Automotive, Commercial, And Residential Applications. This Innovative Solution Effectively Blocks Up To 95% Of Infrared Radiation And 99% Of Harmful Uv Rays, Significantly Reducing Interior Heat Build-Up, Protecting Interiors From Fading And Deterioration, And Enhancing Overall Energy Efficiency. Its Superior Optical Clarity Ensures Uncompromised Visibility While Its Hydrophobic And Oleophobic Properties Keep Surfaces Cleaner, Reducing Maintenance Efforts. Ideal For Automotive Windows, Commercial Building Facades, And Residential Glass Structures, Star Heat Shield Is A Durable, Eco-Friendly Coating Designed For Comfort, Sustainability, And Long-Lasting Protection
